p: We evaluated the levels of total virus-specific Abs in the sera of vaccinated mice by ELISA as described [ 11, 21, 38, 46, 49, 51]. Briefly, 96-well plates were coated with cell lysates from mock-, PR8/WT- and X31-infected MDCK cells or with 250 ng/well of recombinant PR8 HA protein (NR-19240; BEI Resources) and incubated ON at 4 Â°C. Mouse sera were tested as two-fold dilutions (starting dilution of 1:50) and titers determined as described [ 46, 49].
